it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager

Class PreferenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager.UserManager
      • it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager.PreferenceManager

  • public class PreferenceManager
extends UserManager
    This class provide all methods related to handle the user preferences
